SEARCH
Package itec220.labs

Class Game

java.lang.Object
itec220.labs.Game
public class Game extends Object
To create a class that communicated with the board, which will handle piece logic, and allow for this class to handle game state logic, such as check, checkmate, etc.
Author:
Donovan Horne

      public void promote(int rank, int file, PieceType type)
      Promote a pawn on the board
      Parameters:
      rank - row of the pawn
      file - column of the pawn
      type - the type of piece the pawn is promoting to

    • gameOver

      public boolean gameOver()
      Return a boolean of whether the game is over or not
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean, true if the game is over, false if it will continue

    • move

      public boolean move(int startX, int startY, int endX, int endY)
      Call a move on the board
      Parameters:
      startX - the starting row of the piece
      startY - the starting column of the piece
      endX - the destination row of the piece
      endY - the destination row of the piece
      Returns:
      Return a boolean based on whether the move was made or not
